thread.title: Roberto Martinez claims Liverpool are favourites for Merseyside derby - Gazette Series
thread.title_full: Roberto Martinez claims Liverpool are favourites for Merseyside derby - Gazette Series - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Gazette Series
title: Roberto Martinez claims Liverpool are favourites for Merseyside derby - Gazette Series
text:
Everton boss Roberto Martinez insists it is Liverpool who should be viewed as favourites for Sunday's Merseyside derby at Goodison Park given the amount of money they have spent in recent years. The Toffees go into the contest in encouraging form, having taken eight points from their previous four Barclays Premier League matches, and they are currently fifth in the table.
 Gazette Series.
